title: [1.1x-1.7.10][Deep Resonance—深度共振]小众向玄学科技模组[更新至1.12]
author: 我是来2333
txt_content:
本帖最后由 我是来2333 于 2018-4-15 01:32 编辑 

     Deep Resonance by McJty
=深度共振=1.授权
有点波折不过授权拿到了
2.作者原话
Deep Resonance is a power generation mod for Minecraft meant for both early game power as well as high end and more complicated end game power. This release adds oregen (the resonating ore as well as crystals) so that people can put it in their worlds already. It also has a (default disabled) retrogen option for existing worlds. In the current state of the mod you can produce crystals that give 20000 RF/tick for a total of 1 billion RF. But note that getting to that stage is not going to be easy!
3.介绍
Deep Resonance是由大佬McJty(RFtools,XNET,** Probe…的作者)制作的一个发电mod
没错，它只能发电。
不过里面制作发电的材料[共振水晶]和发电的方式让我感觉非常新颖，放图。
发电方式

共振水晶制作流程

自带储罐

强化共振水晶的方式



4.教程
国外E文教程Direwolf20 Mod Spotlight Deep Resonance YouTube[E文&需FQ]
Bilibili[感谢一天世界君大佬制作的视频][2P有补充]
https://www.bilibili.com/video/av7030449/图文教程待编辑...
5.下载地址
1.7.10––1.9.4需要McJtyLib和ElecCore
1.10及1.11需要McJtyLib,ElecCore和CompatLayer  
1.12需要McJtyLib,ElecCore不再需要CompatLayer !

Release  Download1.11.2
compatlayer-1.11.2-0.3.1.jar
Release  Download6.Changelog1.4.6:  Tanks are now also fluid handlers clientside. That's better for render issues Added nether and end variants of resonating ore. By default enabled in the nether. Crystals now also generate in the nether. They are stronger but less pure. This can all be configured Renamed the Deep Resonance machine frame so it is less confusing with RFTools Fixed oregen vein size. For this the config had to be regenerated. To enforce that I used different keys for the ore vein size. So if you have custom configs be sure to check that out again 1.4.9:Fixed accidental redstoneflux hard dependency1.6.0:
This version requires McJtyLib 2.6.0!Joseph C. Sible fixed the overworld variant of resonating ore appearing twice in the creative inventory
Added obsidian to the recipe of the tank to avoid people (ab)using them as cheap liquid conduits
Fixed a problem with the resonating plate recipe being broken
Fixed an OC dependenc



最后:介绍图片直接引用国外图床，加载可能稍慢         
         此mod最好搭配其他mod使用
         搭配RFtools食用更佳
         图文教程正在制作中
         原地址:https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/deep-resonance

replies.author: touhouzun
replies.txt_content: 可以看出后来的各位还是尽量去原帖下载更好

replies.author: Michael_J
replies.txt_content: 谢谢，最近正好碰到这个mod，可以看教程怎么玩了

replies.author: combinesoldier
replies.txt_content: 这东西要想发到接近2WRF得消耗很多末影珍珠跟恶魂之泪，反正就是堆这两个材料，激光发射器还需要水晶供应，性价比其实并不是非常高，但是主要还是相对于其他mod比较便携，一个优质水晶发电量也是很可观的，而且提纯过程没必要三个属性值都要100%，因为到了90%以后速度就已经很慢了个人感觉三个值在90-95%左右就不错了

replies.author: combinesoldier
replies.txt_content:
combinesoldier 发表于 2017-3-26 16:33
这东西要想发到接近2WRF得消耗很多末影珍珠跟恶魂之泪，反正就是堆这两个材料，激光发射器还需要水晶供应， ...
所以我把激光注射器注射一次消耗的水晶量调低，处理液态水晶量改高，让他在br面前有一些竞争力，不过br配mek蒸汽涡轮，简直绝配，mek蒸汽涡轮发电量大，规模越大蒸汽利用率越高，黄铀矿石生成量还多，简直就是0成本发电

replies.author: 我是来2333
replies.txt_content:
combinesoldier 发表于 2017-3-26 16:35
所以我把激光注射器注射一次消耗的水晶量调低，处理液态水晶量改高，让他在br面前有一些竞争力，不过br配 ...
不过最主要是玩法啊，BR就是一成不变的采黄铀，造涡轮，而且多方块还占位置，地方如果太紧张可以用这个mod发电

replies.author: combinesoldier
replies.txt_content:
我是来2333 发表于 2017-3-26 17:39
不过最主要是玩法啊，BR就是一成不变的采黄铀，造涡轮，而且多方块还占位置，地方如果太紧张可以用这个mo ...
问题是这玩意发电是有辐射的，辐射源是那个接收器，小地方要是用这个。。。
